TopicTitle: UI stopped working after plane crash at runway.

Articles.Content:
So I got a black screen behind the UI and and I was unable to revert, quicklod or go to the space center. I accidentally used whack a kerbal on the runway during takeoff and the plane was destroyed in the exploding runway. Upon trying to revert this happened.

The output log: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/xyrr86pbdi414i0/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xyrr86pbdi414i0/output_log.txt?dl=0)

My PC build:

-8GB RAM

-AMD Athlon x4 860k processor

-Nvidia GT730 graphics card

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T04:29:31Z" title="05/04/2015 04:29  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by SpacecraftX**
